name: Incandescence
display_help: Kheldians have a natural mild resistance to Energy and Negative Energy damage. This Auto power is always on and costs no Endurance.

name: Energy_Flight
display_help: Energy Flight allows you to travel large distances quickly. If you attack a target while this power is on, your flight speed will be temporarily reduced. Your Energy Flight speed increases with your Level.

name: Shining_Shield
display_help: When you toggle on your Shining Shield, you create an energy barrier that grants you high resistance to Smashing and Lethal damage. Recharge: Very Fast
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to smashing and lethal damage.

name: Essence_Boost
display_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Essence Boost also grants you resistance to Toxic Damage. Recharge: Very Long
display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} and increase your maximum Hit Points.

messages.display_victim_hit: You are healed by your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.

name: Thermal_Shield
display_help: When you toggle on Thermal Shield, you emit tendrils of Kheldian energy that give you resistance to Fire and Cold damage. Recharge: Very Fast
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to fire and cold damage.

name: Combat_Flight
display_help: For hovering and aerial combat. This power is much slower than Energy Flight, but provides some Defense, offers good air control, costs little Endurance, and has none of the penalties associated with Energy Flight. Switch to this mode when fighting other flying foes.
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you harder to hit.

name: Quantum_Shield
display_help: When you toggle on Quantum Shield, you become highly resistant to Energy and Negative damage. Recharge: Very Fast
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to energy and negative damage.

name: Group_Energy_Flight
display_help: You can endow your nearby teammates with Flight. Be mindful! Your friends will fall if you run out of Endurance or if they travel too far away from you. Group Energy Flight travel speed is slower than Energy Flight.
display_target_help: You are granted the ability to fly!
display_attacker_hit: You grant {PlayerDest} the power of Flight!
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} endows you with Flight! Stay close or you will fall!

name: White_Dwarf
display_help: Kheldians are masters of energy and matter. A Peacebringer can transform into a massive unstoppable energy beast known as a White Dwarf. When you choose this power, you will have access to 6 other powers that can only be used while in this form. You will not be able to use any other powers while in White Dwarf form. White Dwarf has awesome resistance to all damage except Psionics, as well as controlling effects. White Dwarf also has improved HP and Endurance Recovery, but is limited to melee attacks. Recharge: Very Fast

name: White_Dwarf_Strike
display_help: The White Dwarf Strike is a moderate melee attack that releases Kheldian light on impact, which can Knock Down foes, and reduce a target's Defense. This power is only available while in White Dwarf Form. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Fast
display_target_help: The White Dwarf Strike has weakened your Defenses!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

name: White_Dwarf_Smite
display_help: White Dwarf Smite is powerful melee attack that can often Disorient or Knock Down opponents. White Dwarf Smite can also bring down fliers, and reduce their defense. This power is only available while in White Dwarf Form. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Fast
display_target_help: You have been knocked down by the White Dwarf Smite. You are Disoriented and cannot fly.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Stun {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

name: White_Dwarf_Flare
display_help: You channel the might of your Kheldian energy into the very Earth itself. The ground erupts and cracks with luminous energy, blasting all nearby foes, knocking them back and reducing their defense. This power is only available while in White Dwarf Form. Damage: High, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, High DMG(Energy), Foe -DEF, Knockback
display_target_help: The White Dwarf Flare has weakened your Defenses!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

name: White_Dwarf_Sublimation
display_help: Through perfect control of your body and energy, you can concentrate for a few moments and heal yourself. This power is only available while in White Dwarf Form. Recharge: Slow

messages.display_victim_hit: You are healed by your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.

name: White_Dwarf_Step
display_help: White Dwarfs can Teleport long distances. White Dwarf Step has no recharge time, and can be reactivated without pause, as long as you have Endurance.

name: White_Dwarf_Antagonize
display_help: This power attracts the attention of a foe and all those around him. Use this to pull villains off of an ally in trouble. An Accuracy check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: The White Dwarf grabs your attention and you focus your attacks on it.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Provoke {PlayerDest} to attack you.
Your {PowerName} partially hit! {PlayerDest} is not taunted but their range is reduced!
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} partially hits you with their {PowerName}! Your range is reduced but the Taunt is not successful!

name: Reform_Essence
display_help: Through perfect control of your body and energy, you can concentrate for a few moments and heal yourself. Recharge: Slow

messages.display_victim_hit: You are healed by your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} heals you for {Damage} hit points!

name: Conserve_Energy
display_help: You can focus for a moment to Conserve your Energy. After activating this power, you expend less Endurance on all other powers for a while. Recharge: Very Long

messages.display_attacker_hit: You concentrate and Conserve your Energy. Your powers now cost less Endurance for a while.

name: Quantum_Acceleration
display_help: Quantum Acceleration greatly increases your maximum fly speed, provides a high amount of defense, flight protection and additional flight control, however while active you can only use powers that target yourself. This flight protection is only active while Energy Flight, Combat Fight, Group Energy Flight or Quantum Flight is active. Recharge: Slow

name: Quantum_Flight
display_help: You shift your quantum matrix and become more energy than matter. No longer bound by the laws of normal physics, you become intangible to other entities and can fly at high speeds. However, after 30 seconds the phase out effect will wear off. 30 seconds later, if this power is still active the user will become phased out once again. Quantum Flight offers greater flight speed and some stealth, but costs more endurance. Recharge: Slow

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Intangibilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Intangibilizes you with their {PowerName}.

name: Restore_Essence
display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can Restore your Essence and bring yourself from the brink of death. You will revive with most of your Hit Points and half your Endurance and be protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. Recharge: Very Long
display_target_help: You have Restored your Essence. You are protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds.
display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} yourself from the brink of death. You feel weak and cannot do anything for a while.

messages.display_victim_hit: You are healed by your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of damage over time.
Your {PowerName} grants you {Damage} points of endurance.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You Immobilize {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} Immobilizes you with their {PowerName}.

name: Light_Form
display_help: When you activate Light Form, you become pure Kheldian energy and are extremely resistant to most damage. You are also partially protected from some Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, Sleep, Knockback and Repel effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Light Form costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of Hit Points and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Knockback, Repel, All DMG but Psionics)
display_attacker_hit: Your Light Form has made you highly resistant to most attacks.

messages.display_victim_hit: Your {PowerName} drains {Damage} points of endurance.
